Benjamin says hi.

Benjamin is a web developer based in Hasselt, Belgium. He creates (data based) web applications.
He's specialized in Front End Development, but likes to design databases and API's as well.

TechStack

Benjamin absolutely loves Javascript.
Depending on the type of application, he uses Angular or React.

For creating API's, he uses Express.js because it's fast and simple.
For handling third party modules, he is very fond of Node.js

Databases he queries in MySQL or NoSQL. Recently he dove into GraphQL and also discovered the power of Firebase.
